title: Leetstat-CLI
description: A CLI tool to get all your important statistics in your terminal only, so that the next time you want to have a quick look at your stats you don't have to open your browser.

title: Disney+ Hotstar
description: A frontend clone of Disney+ Hotstar website, which I created while learning react. It uses Firebase for storing the data as well as for Google authentication.

title: Keeper Web App
description: A web application to keep all of your important notes saved at one place. It allows you to create, access, delete and update your notes.

title: Human Gait Recognition
description: A Machine learning project to recognize person based on his / her walking manner. I worked on this project in my final year of graduation.
